name: @incremental.design/input-event-listeners
description: Callbacks for `ClipboardEvent` `DeviceMotionEvent` `DeviceOrientationEvent` `DragEvent` `FocusEvent` `GamepadEvent` `KeyboardEvent` `MouseEvent` `TouchEvent` `UIEvent` `WheelEvent` listeners. These callbacks normalize and filter event details to make them easier to interpret.
author: Ajay Ganapathy <lets.talk@designbyajay.com>
